name: Endless Furry Killer 3D
description:
Endless Furry Killer 3D is the second installment of the Furry Killer Series!
The game is currently in alpha development process.


DISCLAIMER:
ENDLESS FURRY KILLER 3D DOES NOT
CONDONE OR SUPPORT ANY TYPE OF
REAL WORLD VIOLENCE OR HATE TOWARD
ANY GROUP OF ANY KIND!

Key Features:
1. Six Weapons, pistol, shotgun, mini-gun, rail-gun, and flamer.
2. Endless Furry combat. Play till you die!
3. Four ready to play levels. Easy, medium, and hard modes, and one test level.
4. Systems that keeps track of players score and time alive.
5. Hidden Easter Eggs!
6. Consistent updates!

NOTE:
The game is a work in progress due to the high demand for a better "Endless Furry Killer" game.
